content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "trapped_chest", "quantity": 15, "index": 11}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 7, "index": 12}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 43, "index": 16}, {"type": "stray_spawn_egg", "quantity": 6, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 44, "index": 39}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 12, "index": 43}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 36, "index": 44}]

thought: The recipe for stripped_crimson_hyphae requires placing 4 stripped_crimson_stems in the crafting grid in a square pattern. Therefore, I will first move one of the stripped_crimson_stems from slot 35 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok

Ok
